    • Method Detail

      • GetAllOrderItems

        public java.util.List<OrderItem> GetAllOrderItems()
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all order items from the database. This method executes a SQL query to fetch all records from the order_items table and constructs a list of OrderItem objects from the result set.
        Returns:
        A List of OrderItem objects representing all order items in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection.

      • GetOrderItemById

        public OrderItem GetOrderItemById​(int orderItemId)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves an order item from the database by its unique identifier. This method executes a SQL query to fetch a record from the order_items table that matches the specified order item ID and constructs an OrderItem object from the result set.
        Parameters:
        orderItemId - The unique identifier of the order item to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        An OrderItem object representing the order item with the specified ID, or null if no such order item exists.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection.

      • GetOrderItemsByOrderId

        public java.util.List<OrderItem> GetOrderItemsByOrderId​(int orderId)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all order items associated with a specific order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The order ID to search for.
        Returns:
        A list of OrderItem objects associated with the given order ID.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

      • GetOrderItemsByMenuItemId

                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all order items associated with a specific menu item ID.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - The menu item ID to search for.
        Returns:
        A list of OrderItem objects associated with the given menu item ID.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

      • AddOrderItem

        public int AddOrderItem​(int orderId,
                        int sugarPercentage,
                        int icePercentage,
                        int quantity,
                        int menuItemId)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Inserts a new order item into the database.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The order ID to associate with the order item.
        sugarPercentage - The percentage of sugar for the order item.
        icePercentage - The percentage of ice for the order item.
        quantity - The quantity of the order item.
        menuItemId - The menu item ID associated with the order item.
        Returns:
        An integer indicating success (1) or failure (0).
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

      • UpdateOrderItem

        public int UpdateOrderItem​(int orderItemId,
                           int newOrderId,
                           int newSugarPercentage,
                           int newIcePercentage,
                           int newQuantity,
                           int newMenuItemId)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates an existing order item in the database with new details. This method executes a SQL query to update the record in the order_items table that matches the specified order item ID with the provided new details.
        Parameters:
        orderItemId - The unique identifier of the order item to be updated.
        newOrderId - The new order ID to associate with the order item.
        newSugarPercentage - The new percentage of sugar for the order item.
        newIcePercentage - The new percentage of ice for the order item.
        newQuantity - The new quantity of the order item.
        newMenuItemId - The new menu item ID associated with the order item.
        Returns:
        An integer indicating the success of the operation: 1 if successful, 0 if failed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection.

      • DeleteOrderItem

        public int DeleteOrderItem​(int orderItemId)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes an order item from the database by its unique identifier. This method executes a SQL query to remove a record from the order_items table that matches the specified order item ID.
        Parameters:
        orderItemId - The unique identifier of the order item to be deleted.
        Returns:
        An integer indicating the success of the operation: 1 if successful, 0 if failed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection.
